div.p: Figure S2. Example 'is_a' and 'part_of' pedigree mapping of the GO term GO:0022857 (name: transmembrane transporter activity). The 'is_a'-only mapping is shown light grey; GO:0022857 is a subtype of GO:0005215 (transporter activity), which is a subtype of the root term GO:0003674 (molecular function), while GO:0022857 can also be mapped to the root term GO:0008150 (biological process) through 'part_of' relationships. a powerpoint (ppt) file with an example pedigree mapping of the GO term GO:0022857 to its 'parent' terms through "is_a" and "part_of" relationships
